video.description:
Creamy Vegan Mushroom Sauce. This Mushroom wine sauce is flexible and versatile and great to serve as side with pasta, roasted veggies, mashed veggies and more. 
FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2019/12/vegan-mushroom-sauce.html

A flavorful sauce as a side elevates comfort dishes to a new level. This Creamy Mushroom sauce with caramelized mushrooms, herbs, wine, and creamy base is versatile and delicious!

Serve the sauce over cauliflower steaks, with pasta, roasted veggies, over mashed veggies, veggie meatloafs or burgers, grilled portobello mushroom, bowls and more. Change up the herbs, add more wine and less non dairy cream, adjust away to your preference!
Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free Recipe. Nut-free option.  

#veganmushroomsaue #mushroomwinesauce #veganricha #easyveganrecipes #veganholidayrecipes
Music: Epidemic sound

recipeIngredient: 3 cloves of garlic minced or crushed
2 tbsp finely chopped onion or shallots
1 tsp dried herbs such as rosemary and thyme or use 1-2 tbsp fresh
1 tsp mustard (condiment, or use 1/4 tsp ground mustard + 1/2 tsp vinegar )

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil or broth in a skillet over medium heat. Add the sliced mushrooms and Cook until golden. 5 o 8 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil or broth in a skillet over medium heat. Add the sliced mushrooms and Cook until golden. 5 o 8 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Add garlic and onion and cook for a minute. Add the herbs, salt and pepper and mix in.
recipeInstructions.name: Add garlic and onion and cook for a minute. Add the herbs, salt and pepper and mix in.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the wine and mix in and bring to a boil. Add mustard and mix in
recipeInstructions.name: Add the wine and mix in and bring to a boil. Add mustard and mix in

recipeInstructions.text: Add non dairy cream of choice and mix in. You can use half water and half non dairy cream for less creeamy mushroom sauce. Bring to a boil. Taste and adjust flavor. Adjust consistency with veggie broth if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Add non dairy cream of choice and mix in. You can use half water and half non dairy cream for less creeamy mushroom sauce. Bring to a boil. Taste and adjust flavor. Adjust consistency with veggie broth if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with fresh herbs and serve over cauliflower steaks, roasted veggies, mashed veggies, veggie meatloafs or burgers, grilled portobello mushrooms etcStore: Refrigerate for upto 4 days.
